mapper.select: select invoice_id, company_id, subscription_id, invoice_no, amount_total, currency, status, issued_at, due_at, e_invoice_url, created_at from invoices where company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and subscription_id = #{subscriptionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and (status is null or upper(trim(status)) != 'PAID') order by due_at desc nulls last limit 1
